allowance(TokenStorage,address,address).details: Returns the allowance for a spender

params.owner: The address of the owner of the tokens.

returns.remaining: Number of tokens the spender is allowed to spend.

approve(TokenStorage,address,address,uin.details: Approves a spender [ERC20]. Note that using the approve/transferFrom presents a possible security vulnerability described in: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1YLPtQxZu1UAvO9cZ1O2RPXBbT0mooh4DYKjA_jp-RLM/edit#heading=h.quou09mcbpzw Use transferAndCall to mitigate.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.
params.spender: The address of the future spender.

balanceOf(TokenStorage,address).details: Returns the number tokens associated with an address.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.

transferFrom(TokenStorage,address,addres.details: Transfers tokens from a specific address [ERC20]. The address owner has to approve the spender beforehand.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.
params.from: Address to debet the tokens from.
